name: Petal Breeze
description: A gentle breeze of jasmine petals.

name: Fragrant Shield
description: Emits a scent that sharply boosts defense.

name: Zesty Burst
description: A sharp burst of citrus flavor.

name: Ristretto Flame
description: A quick, fiery espresso shot.

name: Maple Splash
description: A sweet splash of maple syrup.

name: Sticky Trap
description: Traps enemies, boosting your attack.

name: Hot Cinder
description: A spray of hot cinders that burns the foe.

name: Shell Armor
description: Harden's the user's shell, increasing defense.

name: Espresso Shot
description: A concentrated shot of powerful espresso.

name: Overcharge
description: Boosts attack at the cost of some defense.

name: Ginger Twist
description: A swirling attack with a spicy ginger aroma.

name: Spicy Spores
description: Scatters spores that may poison the target.

name: Vine Whip
description: Whips the target with tough vines.

name: Soothing Scent
description: A calming aroma that slightly heals the user.

name: Chocolate Rush
description: A powerful rush fueled by sugar.

name: Sugar High
description: Greatly boosts attack for a short period.

name: Citrus Splash
description: A splash of juice that might lower defense.

name: Syrup Sludge
description: Sticky syrup that might put the opponent to sleep.

name: Dark Roast
description: An intense, hot roast that may cause a severe burn.

name: Hard Shell
description: Hardens the body, significantly boosting defense.

name: Spice Cloud
description: A cloud of spices that may poison the target.

name: Aromatherapy
description: A soothing scent that heals the user.

name: Zestful Focus
description: Boosts focus, increasing attack power.

name: Chocolate Rain
description: A heavy rain of chocolate.

name: Nutty Block
description: A hard block with a nut shell that might increase defense.

name: Vampiric Shot
description: A dark shot that heals the user for half the damage dealt.
